news.title: Statement of FSFE and FSF Latin America to the 2005 WIPO General Assemblies
news.body: Not continuing what was begun, or changing from a horse to a mule midstream, as the honored Indian delegate so eloquently put it, would be wasting the time and effort spent on this initiative by all sides, North and South. For this reason we strongly support the notion of letting the IIM process finish what it began.
